hero.newWay: A new way to lose weight
hero.title: Sustainable weight loss backed by medical science.
hero.description: Our program combines approved medication with personal coaching from a dedicated care team to help you achieve and sustain a healthy weight.
hero.feature1: Effective weight loss up to 25-30 kg
hero.feature2: Reliable & approved medication and top ranked health coach assistance
hero.feature3: Seamless service – no lifelong subscriptions, no hidden costs
hero.feature4: Patients report top satisfaction and lasting change
hero.feature5: Easy to follow instructions & program to save your time & money

obesity.title: Understanding obesity:
obesity.titleHighlight: It's a complex medical condition, not a choice.
obesity.description: For too long, the story around weight has been about willpower. But modern medicine shows that obesity is a complex disease, deeply influenced by your genetics, hormones, and environment. We now understand the biology behind the struggle, and with that understanding comes new, effective medical treatments that can finally help.
obesity.bodyBiologyDescription: Your body's natural "set point" is controlled by hormones. When you diet, your body often fights back by increasing hunger and slowing your metabolism, making lasting results difficult on your own.
obesity.modernMedicineDescription: Clinically-proven medications like GLP-1s work with your body's biology. Under a doctor's guidance, they help adjust your set point and reduce hunger signals, making sustainable health possible.

pricing.subtitle: An Investment In Your Long-Term Health
pricing.title: Simple,
pricing.description: We believe in being completely open about the cost of our program. There are no hidden fees or long-term commitments. Your monthly membership gives you complete access to our medical team and the support you need to succeed on your journey.
pricing.doctorFeature: Receive ongoing care from a board-certified doctor who creates your plan, manages your prescriptions, and safely guides your progress.
pricing.medicationFeature: We manage the entire prescription process, with your approved medication prescribed to you and give you a personal health care coaching.
pricing.messagingFeature: Enjoy unlimited messaging with your personal care team for continuous support, coaching, and answers to all your questions.
pricing.lifestyleDescription: Your access to medical treatment and support.
pricing.medicalDescription: Your all-in-one access to our medical treatment and personal lifestyle coaching team based.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.helpButton: Still need help? Get in touch

safety.question: Is this program safe?
safety.answer: Yes, our program is completely safe. All treatments are overseen by board-certified physicians who specialize in weight management. We conduct thorough medical evaluations before starting any treatment and provide ongoing monitoring throughout your journey.

sideEffects.question: What are the side effects of the medication?
sideEffects.answer: Common side effects may include mild nausea, decreased appetite, and occasional digestive discomfort, especially during the initial weeks. These effects typically diminish as your body adjusts. Our medical team closely monitors all patients and adjusts treatment plans as needed to minimize any discomfort.

foodRestrictions.question: Do I have to stop eating the foods I love?
foodRestrictions.answer: Not at all! Our approach focuses on sustainable lifestyle changes rather than restrictive dieting. You'll learn to enjoy your favorite foods in moderation while developing healthier eating patterns. Our nutrition coaching helps you make informed choices without feeling deprived.

treatmentDuration.question: How long is the treatment?
treatmentDuration.answer: Treatment duration varies by individual, but most patients see significant results within 3-6 months. Some continue treatment for 12-18 months for optimal results. Your doctor will work with you to determine the right timeline based on your goals, progress, and medical needs.

financing.question: Are there any financing options available?
financing.answer: Yes, we offer flexible payment plans to make our program accessible. We work with several financing partners to provide monthly payment options that fit your budget. Contact our team to discuss the best financing solution for your situation.

bmi.title: Find out your BMI
bmi.disclaimer: *This is a starting point for understanding your health. If you have a BMI over 27, the next step is to speak with a medical professional.

step1.title: Online Consult
step1.description: Tell us about your health history in a short online form. You'll then have a private consultation with a board-certified doctor to see if you're a candidate. Sometimes we ask you to leave blood samples to make the evaluation correct.

step2.title: Get Your Custom Plan
step2.description:
Your doctor reviews your health profile. You have two options to choose:

• Medical treatment program - Monthly consultations with your doctor
• Lifestyle program - Regular follow-up and training with a health coach to guide you on nutrition and workout

step3.title: Receive Treatment & Support - All the way long
step3.description: Your medication is delivered discreetly to your home. From there, your dedicated care team provides ongoing support to guide you, adjust your plan, and celebrate your success. We aim to treat you, give you the necessary support with lifestyle changes and educate you about overcoming obesity and having a healthy lifestyle. Being a part of this project - enjoy your journey losing weight and improving your health.

statistics.stat1: In Sweden, 1 in 2 adults is now classified as overweight or living with obesity.
statistics.stat2: of people who lose weight through traditional dieting alone regain it within a few years.
statistics.stat3: A 15% average weight loss with our program dramatically improves heart health and lowers diabetes risk.

partner.title: Your
partner.description: We were founded in Stockholm by a team of dedicated doctors and specialists who saw a need for a more modern, accessible, and empathetic approach to obesity care. Our mission is simple: to provide safe, effective, and science-backed medical treatment to help our patients live healthier, fuller lives. Your health and privacy are our highest priorities.

testimonials.testimonial1: For the first time, I don't think about food all day. The medication quieted the noise in my head, and the support from my doctor has been fantastic. I've lost 18kg and feel in control.
testimonials.testimonial2: The transformation has been incredible. Not just physically, but mentally too. I finally have the tools and support I needed to make lasting changes.
testimonials.testimonial3: After years of struggling, I found a program that actually works. The personalized approach made all the difference in my journey.
